ygData.subject: Re: Hunting Grounds
ygData.msgSnippet: I agree with you there. I have an amazing hunting ground, two of them actually but now one is totally camped out so i may as well tell the rest of you where my
ygData.messageBody:
I agree with you there. I have an amazing hunting ground, two of them
actually but now one is totally camped out so i may as well tell the rest of
you where my first one was. Actually this is no BIG secret but still it isnt
easy to get to. In lake rathe there are tons of camping spots that are
usually open for the taking because its hard to navigate in this zone. My
favorite spot is the large staircase where 3 aviak guards spawn. They spawn
every 2-3 minutes so if you want to do this make sure you are with at least
two other level 21ish people. No you say why is this good looting? well on
average the aviaks drop anywhere from 6 gold to 1 or 2 plat cash, plus words
and pages, plus bronze weapons and even some armor. This can really add up
big time when 3 aviaks spawn 3 minutes apart. so lets say you get the
average 6 gold every loot. no more no less. no weapons or items either. Go
there for one hour, in a group of 3 you will loot 20 times about. Thats 12
plat in an hour, not bad considering they usually have stuff along with
cash.

There, now you know my OLD hunting spot. its still good and i still go there
from time to time. Just not as frequently as i used to.

Rayne

> ----------
> From: Michael Wooldirdge[SMTP:dark@...]
> Reply To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> Sent: Tuesday, June 29, 1999 12:55 PM
> To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [warriors_eq] Hunting Grounds
>
> Actually it wasn't bragging I told you that it wasn't hard to get money
> for a BloodClaw after level 20 and I play on E'ci so I'm not even on your
> server. You asked me where my hunting ground was so I wasn't bragging. The
> reason for not telling you is because once people learn of this it will be
> pointless and too crowded to even attempt to hunt there. Bottom line is
> explore and you'll find good hunting grounds.
>
